conversations.content:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
train_station contains tables such as train.
Table train has columns such as train_id, name, time, service.
Show the name and service for all trains in order by time.

SELECT name,
       service
FROM train
ORDER BY TIME;

SELECT name,
       service
FROM train
ORDER BY time;
